snippet: I was going over there about once a week. They would all be excited about certain jokes and then you would go the next week and the world had passed by. Those jokes are dead and gone and we're on to something else. It's like a hospital emergency room...
abstract: I was going over there about once a week. They would all be excited about certain jokes and then you would go the next week and the world had passed by. Those jokes are dead and gone and we're on to something else. It's like a hospital emergency room the way they work.

headline.main: Behind the Cover Story: Charles McGrath on Stephen Colbert
